alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 2:19PM PST until February 11 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Moderate snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Portions of western Siskiyou County including Sawyers Bar Road near Mt. Etna, California Highway 3 south of Callahan, and Grayback Road northwest of Happy Camp. * WHEN...4 PM PST Friday through 7 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County
